text: "Dedicated Follower of Fashion" is a 1966 song by British band The Kinks. Originally released as a single but was later included on many of their later albums. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom and Singapore, number 36 in the United States and Australia, number 1 in New Zealand and the Netherlands, number 3 in Ireland, number 2 in Denmark, number 11 in Germany and Canada and number 7 in Norway. == References == Category:1966 songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Dedicated Follower of Fashion
